channel.title: Full Metalst-Scape V2.3 - Void minigame
channel.description:
I am currently working on the new Void minigame!
From now, here's the completion of it:
[b]||||||||||[/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [u][b]What you do in the minigame[/b][/u]
Well, my idea is that you kill 4 beasts to get full Void, and at the 4th monster, you get it. But that sounds too easy. So I'm making a minigame, at the 4th monster, when you kill him, you teleport to the treasure chest, you click on it, and get full Void. But the hard part is, is that you have to find the key. The key would be spawning somewhere near the chest.
After you use the key on the chest, there would be a portal near the chest when you get the full Void, and an NPC behind it.
[u]NPC List(In order)[/u]:
[ul][li]Paladin[/li] [li]Blue Dragon[/li] [li]Red Dragon[/li] [li]Black Dragon[/li][/ul]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I hope you guys look forward to this mini game!
I just need the Void IDs.
Edit: I'm posting pictures AS SOON AS IT'S DONE!

item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

wolfs goal, I’m making NPC dialogue to the Lumbridge guide after you kill the last monster. He would be behind a home portal after you’d use a key on a chest for the Void :D.

I’m gonna post wat I put on RuneLocus later, it’s an interesting and well-thoughtout story :P.

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape V2.3 - Void minigame
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

do it this way

when the last npc dies have him say no my dirkinderporch (german for happy meal)

then have your guy say…ok…that was weird…i’ll post a tut later…hopefully it dont get locked…

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape V2.3 - Void minigame
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Just a word.

Don’t make the NPCs a simple attack, attack, attack battle. Make them epic. One idea for a boss monster I had a while ago was to make it so that you could only successfully hit him from behind, and when he was hit in behind he’d go berserk on the person who hit him, making soloing impossible.

Read full topic
